sentence.Network_en: No adventurer of this type ever came to a good end!

sentence.Network_en: Don't break in when the adventurer is telling his own story.
sentence.Network_cn: 冒险家讲他自己的经历时,别打断他.

sentence.Network_en: Some bold , unprincipled , ignorant adventurer was found.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个粗暴卤莽,无所不为, 愚昧无知的冒险家被选中了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 15th cent. (denoting a gambler): from French aventurier, from aventurer 'venture upon' (see adventure)

entry.def: An adventurer is a person who enjoys going to new, unusual, and exciting places.

entry.tran: 投机取巧者；用不正当手段谋求钱财（或权利）者
entry.def: If you describe someone as an adventurer, you disapprove of them because they are using dishonest or immoral methods to gain money or power.

example.tran: 不择手段的机会主义者和野心勃勃的政治投机者

means.word_mean: 1. a person who enjoys taking risks
2. someone who travels into little known regions (especially for some scientific purpose)

Sentence.sentence: They are adventurers from all over the world.

sentences.en: Every year more adventurers sailed west from Spain.
sentences.cn: 每年有更多的冒险家从西班牙向西航行。
